name: market_get_chart
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool bb_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query for all information about finance summary, stocks, quotes, movers, etcâ€¦ to create a financial site/application such as bloomberg.com
API description: Fetches chart data from the specified market endpoint using given parameters.

interval.description: One of the following intervals for the chart data: 'd1', 'd3', 'ytd', 'm1', 'm3', 'm6', 'y1', 'y5'.

is_id.description: The id of the market instrument, typically obtained from the market auto-complete endpoint.
